hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and trimethoprim can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and trimethoprim can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and trimipramine can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  trimipramine  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Urokinase causes bleeding, as can meloxicam ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Urokinase   causes   bleeding, as can   meloxicam   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and valaciclovir can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  valaciclovir  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and valganciclovir can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  valganciclovir  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and valsartan can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  valsartan  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and vancomycin can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  vancomycin  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and venlafaxine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  venlafaxine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Meloxicam causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Meloxicam   causes   bleeding, as can   volanesorsen   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and vortioxetine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  vortioxetine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Warfarin causes bleeding, as can meloxicam ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Warfarin   causes   bleeding, as can   meloxicam   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and xipamide can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  xipamide  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Meloxicam increases the risk of acute renal failure when given with xipamide. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Meloxicam   increases   the risk of acute renal failure when given with   xipamide .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and zidovudine can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Zidovudine increases the risk of haematological toxicity when given with meloxicam. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Zidovudine   increases   the risk of haematological toxicity when given with   meloxicam .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both meloxicam and zoledronate can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  meloxicam  and  zoledronate  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.
